mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT aaa.* FROM (SELECT cl.cid, cl.cname, cl.region, du.cname AS uname, du.phone, cs.systemname, ci.address, to_char(to_timestamp(cl.regtime / 1000), 'yyyy-MM-dd') as jointime, COALESCE(au.ispc, 2) AS ispc, COALESCE(au.isapp, 2) AS isapp, cf.status,cl.logo FROM tb_company_list cl right join tb_company_friend cf on cf.cid = cl.cid LEFT JOIN tb_dept_user du ON du.cid = cl.cid AND du.uid = cl.manager LEFT join tb_company_sysconfig cs on cs.cid = cl.cid left join tb_company_info ci on ci.cid = cl.cid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prod.cid, MIN(prod.ispc) AS ispc, MIN(prod.isapp) AS isapp FROM ( SELECT sq.cid, CASE sq.apptype WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS ispc, CASE sq.apptype WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS isapp FROM (SELECT DISTINCT cid, apptype FROM tb_product_list WHERE status = '1') sq ) prod GROUP BY prod.cid ) au ON au.cid = cf.cid WHERE (du.cname LIKE '%${value}%' OR cl.cname LIKE '%${value}%') AND cf.status in ('1','2') order by cl.id)aaa order by status,jointime LIMIT #{pagesize} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT count(DISTINCT cf.cid) FROM tb_company_list cl right join tb_company_friend cf on cf.cid = cl.cid LEFT JOIN tb_dept_user du ON du.cid = cl.cid AND du.uid = cl.manager LEFT join tb_company_sysconfig cs on cs.cid = cl.cid left join tb_company_info ci on ci.cid = cl.cid WHERE (du.cname LIKE '%%' OR cl.cname LIKE '%%') AND cf.status in ('1','2');
